Reviews.Title: “Clean, basic hotel, close to Camp Nou”
Reviews.Author: Gary T
Reviews.Content: hotel ideal youre looking clean basic hotel close camp nou yore looking barcelona nights budget close metro takes 15 minutes plaza de football ground tapas bars mcdonalds sort close metro ive stayed twice comforts ill return watch football cheap clean bed night remember paying ritz prices dont expect ritz style accommodation

Reviews.Title: “I'll be back”

Reviews.Content: hotel february 2012 weekend barcelona 11yearold son reason booked price proximity camp nou tickets game saturday night warm clean friendly staff comfortable beds sheets blankets expertly day wed bit trouble getting sheets fantastic sleep yes bit noise morning doors banging people talking youre hotel expect warned basic fairly cramped looking spend time hotel look elsewhere using sleep stuff id highly recommend 10 minute walk camp nou 5 minute walk nearest metro theres fantastic little pizzeria corner mcdonalds lovely bakers close proximity lady checked pleasant laughing joking son near perfect english staff friendly smiling id nou trips

Reviews.Title: “Very noisy 'staff'/ Els empleats encarregats de la neteja "mold ruidos"”
Reviews.Author: xicanes
Reviews.Content: spent seven nights hotel loved location located quiet street hardly traffic except commuter steps metro station walk plaza cataluna heart barcelona hour maybe couple times twice stay front desk six oclock morning receptionist raucous twice empty stare mean noise sir question dreaming figuring noise help charge upkeep talked middle ramblas regard whatsoever disturb sign helpless night clean somewhat comfortable bathroom adequate objection else simple proximity metro station
